extendedInfo.description: FULL PACKAGE PRICE DROP 50% OFF REGULAR PRICE - UPGRADE TODAY! â If you're a avid traveller or a keen language learner this is the perfect app â Travel the world and never be unable to communicate! Tap & Say is an all in one world phrasebook covering 11 languages. Each language has over 600 essential phrases categorized and translated with accompanying spoken audio pronunciation by a native speaker. Knowing how to speak a few phrases in a foreign language can make a big difference to your travels. People love it when you make the effort to speak their language. You will make more friends, have more fun on your travels, and be prepared for emergency. â Languages â â± Chinese â± Japanese â± Korean â± Thai â± Vietnamese â± Indonesian â± French â± German â± Spanish â± Italian â± EnglishWe have included useful FREE phrases for every language. Enough to learn the basics and have a simple conversation. When you are ready to learn more there is an upgrade available to download more phrases.â Features â â All in one app with 11 languages â Essential phrases included for FREE â Spoken audio recordings by native speakers â Text translation and romanization (e.g. Pinyin) â Fully localised. e.g. Korean â English, German â Japanese â No internet connection required for use. Ideal for travel â Star your favourite phrases for quick access â Search for phrases by keyword, copy text to clipboard â More content available for downloadâ Categories â â Greetingsâ Essentialsâ Numbers â Time & Date â Out & About â Lodging â Eat & Drink â Shopping â Countries â Family â Dating â Emergency â Feeling sick â Benefits â â° Make new friends and have fun chatting with localsâ° Expand your vocabulary, sharpen your listening skills, perfect your pronunciation! â° Avoid getting ripped off by being misunderstood â° World of dating possibilities :)â° Be prepared for emergency. Police, doctor, hospital, etc.Download this free app today and start learning a new language. Have it installed on your phone for when you need it. reviews.title: Looks good on the surface
reviews.comment: But I already downloaded (and paid) for the phasebook pro of most of these languages and apart from a better looking GUI I\'m unsure of any reason to pay again. For some reason, a few languages that have phrasebooks are missing here like Cantonese and Russian. I wish this came out before the other phrasebook pros and I would of saved a lot of money.
reviews.author: William Chang

reviews.title: Whats goin on!,,,,,,,,
reviews.comment: At first i love it i thought its the best app i ever had. And Seeing all the features its fantastic. Thats why i pay for the pro one. But it sucks man. After paying it never download and it keeps on forcing to close! It said to use wifi and yet i do.!!!! Still not working.... Pls do fix it its disappointing. Im a galaxy note 10.1 user

reviews.title: Great Program
reviews.comment: I gave this 4 stars for two reasons. First having the American phonetic pronunciation would be a great plus. Second having the ability to create folders in the favorites would be wonderful!! Your selection of phrases is a lot more realistic than most programs. Will you be adding either or both of my suggestions as updates any time soon??
reviews.author: Sandra Ching

reviews.title: Not great.
reviews.comment: At first glance this application looks fine.  It offers many languages and the ability to download phrase dictionaries (or the audio perhaps) to your phone for those languages you wish to use.  This all works fine and the application appears to be stable.  Unfortunately, and this is why it gets 1 star, the application insists on being online to work.  So if you happen to be travelling abroad (you know, where you might want to use a foreign language \"phrasebook\") and you don\'t have wifi or mobile data internet access the app is of no use to you at all.  It simply pops up a message to complain you\'re not online.  There are many other apps that do a better job including the Google Translate app which also allows you to download quite a few translation dictionaries all for free.
reviews.author: Andrew Minor
